price: (66) He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allāh that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla afataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿukum shayan walā yaḍurrukum
